section.name: ToDo List
section.P:
Interested in getting involved with the development of Pluto 1.1 and don't know where to start? Having a hard time jumping in with two feet because you're not sure what to do? Here are a couple of items that need to be worked on. These are just ideas. You are encouraged to add things to this list, work on other items, or scratch whatever itch you have.
ToDo Item Compontent Actively Being Worked?
Implement the Driver's PortletPreferenceProvider implementation. See: org.apache.pluto.driver.services.PortletPreferencesProviderImpl Portal Driver No
Implement a Deployer for Pluto 1.1. In order to simplify configuration, Pluto 1.1 has changed the configuration requirements of portlets being deployed to the container. As a result, a new deployer should be written. Deployer No
Clean up error/exception messages. The StringManager should be used to create error messages for exceptions thrown by the container. This will allow messages to by read from properties files and internationalized. Container Yes
